author: Rachel Kraus
title: IBM, MIT, and others to use supercomputers to study coronavirus
description: The fight against the coronavirus has a new ally: supercomputers. IBM, the White House Office of Science and Technology Policy, and the Department of Energy announced Sunday they are spearheading the COVID-19 High Performance Computing Consortium, which aims …
content:
